comments.comment:
Woman to be stoned to death for adultery in Saudi Arabia - while male partner to receive 100 lashes
The married 45-year-old was working as a maid in Riyadh and was convicted of adultry in August but her partner was given a lesser punishment.A woman faces being stoned to death after being convicted of adultery in Saudi Arabia - while the man she was caught with faces 100 lashes.

The married 45-year-old woman, originally from Sri Lanka, was working as a maid in Riyadh and was convicted of adultery in August.
But her partner, who was single and also from Sri Lanka, was given a punishment of 100 lashes after being found guilty of the same offence.
Upul Deshapriya, spokesman for the Foreign Employment Bureau said: "She has accepted the crime four times in the courts.

"But the Foreign Employment Bureau has hired lawyers and have appealed against the case.
"The appeal is going on. Also from the foreign ministry side, they are in negotiation with the Saudi government on a diplomatic level."
comments.author: Rasik Bhai

replies.replyComment: shanii jayasuriya dear sister sometimes your correct ..only god knows what happened ..

shanii jayasuriya sahathika eththa oya kiyanne.ape samahara nonala mahaththayala katha karanne hariyata ege messek wath wahala ne wage.ape samahara nonala mewage inne bangali,indiyan,pakisthan,wage ratawal wala un ekka.pirimath e wage pilipin,indunishiya,indiyan genu thiyan innawa.kohe hari ahinsaka geniyekta hari pirimiyekta hari monawa hari unoth onna enawa ara paththini ammala apppala okkoma sudana kama pennanna.mamath kuwait apita ape kan walata ehenawa me arabiyo kiyana dewal silaniyo sharmotha.onna ochcharai apita lebunu hoda name mungen ape samahara sakkili nisa.

shanii jayasuriya ekanam aththa,  sakkili pawkarayo kisima samawak denne nathi walaththa anunta walaththakam karanna hodai wal sakkili jaathiya lat walawalwala panuwoma wela okun ipadenne oyakarana pawkaara wadawalata henahathama wadinna one onta. polowapalagana ethanama yatawela mariyaw pawkaara hulawallu.

anika oya sinhala kellek kiyala katha karanna epa ape lankawe kellek ape akama le kellek kiyala katha karanna.meeta kalin akaparak ohoma siddiyak wela lankawe gahanu kenekta rajaya wesin sama dunna mathaka thiyanawada danaha oheta? ethakotath me jaathiya sith unu nowana jathiyak kiyalada kiyanne sahodariya. man oyage illane aka illimak jathibeda katha karanna epa methana jeewetha gana wetharak katha karanna.waraddak karanam ohuge nama gama wetharak bawetha karanna.mulu jathiyama adinna epa.man hithanne oyala thamange jathiyath akka wetharai wenna athi jeewath wenne habai akamuthuwa jeewath wena samajya lankawe hugak thiyana kiyana aka man oba thumiyata garuthwayen kiya sitinawa..

mrs shanii oyata deyak kiyannam muslim kiyala mulusamajayama ganna epa waradi wedihata.oya kiyanne methana hitha unu nowana jathiyak kiyala ahenam oyalage jathiya hith unu wena jathiyak kiyalada kiyanne?thamange duwawa thamange thaatha wisin dushanaya karala thiyanwa ahala nadda lankawe? oyata udaharana onnam wistara athuwa kiyanam. sahodariya oya me gahaiya wenuwen duk wedina aka hari ath waradi matha prakasha karanna epa.lajjawa baya garuthwaya thiyana pirisakuth innawa hama agamakama. agolanta agawra karala katha karanna epa.apith pathanne meyata othanin galaweemak labennai.waradak karoth daduwam wediya youtui. mewa me rate ada eye karana akak neweine awa dana dana ai waradi karanne...
